name: SupportEphraimAndTana
_source: speak;Tana;Oh, Ephraim!|I'm so glad to see you.
speak;Ephraim;Tana, you should pull back to a safer location.|What would we do if you were attacked by archers?
speak;Tana;But...I want to go where you go.|I feel safer when I'm close to you, Ephraim.
speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry, but I won't be able to protect you if I get into a duel.|I have to focus on fighting our enemies.
speak;Tana;Oh, no...|Please, Ephraim, don't speak to me like that.|I've trained with Frelia's finest pegasus knights.|I can fight, too!
speak;Tana;I'm sorry if I've been following you too closely lately...|But I promise that I won't be a burden.|I'll work my hardest.|So, please!|Don't make me stay behind and wait for you.
speak;Ephraim;Tana...|All right.|If it's what you want.|We'll go together.
speak;Tana;Ephraim, do you remember when we first met?
speak;Ephraim;...Ah, of course!|It was at Castle Frelia, wasn't it?|Eirika and I had been invited to visit for your birthday celebration.
speak;Tana;Oh, I'm so glad you remembered!
speak;Ephraim;King Hayden seemed so delighted that we'd come to visit.|I think that was the first time I met Innes, too.
speak;Tana;So, Ephraim, what did you think of the dress I was wearing?

speak;Ephraim;I...|Hm...|I'm sorry, but I don't think I got a good look at it at the time.|Perhaps you don't remember, but as soon as I arrived, Innes challenged me.|We ended up having an archery match right when the party began.|I think Innes won that match.
speak;Tana;Do you remember my hair?|I was so happy with it!
speak;Ephraim;Your...hair?|Uh...|Well, right after our archery match, Innes challenged me to the spear.|I think I won that match!
speak;Tana;I'll bet you don't even remember what I said afterward!
speak;Ephraim;Er, Innes can be persistent.|After spears, we moved on to jousting.|That time, I think it was...
speak;Tana;Oh, you!|You only remember what happened with my brother!|You don't care about me at all, do you!?
speak;Ephraim;Oh, no, no!|That's not true.|It's just...
speak;Tana;Fine!|Why should I care about you when you can't even be bothered to care about me?|You just keep having fun with my brother and don't pay me any mind at all!
speak;Ephraim;Tana, wait a minute!|Hey!|Don't go off on your own!|...What is she so upset about?
speak;Tana;Hello, Ephraim.|Shall we take a break together?
speak;Ephraim;Well, you're in a better mood today!
speak;Ephraim;Oh, nothing.|Never mind.|So, uh, what can I do for you?
speak;Tana;Eirika helped me prepare lunch.|I haven't tried it yet, but I'm sure it's delicious.|Would you like to eat with me?
speak;Ephraim;...Tana.|This is a battlefield.|It's all right to take a break, but let's not let our guards down.
speak;Tana;You're always like that.|You're so stiff and formal and detached all the time.
speak;Ephraim;Tana...|What's the matter with you?|You've been acting so odd lately.
speak;Tana;Yes, I am acting funny.|And it's all your fault, Ephraim!|Whenever I try to talk to you, you always keep your distance!|No matter how hard I try, you never open up to me.
speak;Tana;It's just...|You never pay any attention to me.|You never have...|It makes me so sad.|All I want to do is be near you more and more.
speak;Ephraim;Tana, you're still just a child at heart, aren't you?
speak;Tana;Ephraim!|Don't talk about me like that...
speak;Ephraim;No, I meant it as a compliment.|Because you're so young, your words have such a simple, honest purity...|I do appreciate your affection.
speak;Tana;Ephraim...|Do you think you could make more time for me, so we can chat?
speak;Ephraim;Yes...of course.|But we don't have the luxury to stop and chat on the battlefield.|We have an obligation to end this war first.|Let's go.
speak;Tana;Yes, all right.|I'll see you later.|I'm looking forward to it.
